overview:
Matthew Ho is an Australian Chinese entrepreneur based in Melbourne, Australia.

I am the co-founder of Native Tongue, which won Australia’s first Startup Weekend Competition held in 2011.

I previously worked for Airbnb, Next Digital, and Deloitte.

I am an advisor to rentwant.com, a peer to peer rental website based in Australia.

I am the organiser of the SXSW meetups in Australia (Sydney & Melbourne).

I also organise the monthly MCombinator dinners, which is for founders of startups based in Melbourne, Australia.
